thread.title: Radva, Rob
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Radva, Rob

author: Radva, Rob
title: Radva, Rob
text: I had a great experience with VRP when I rented a beach home in St Augustine last Augustine. I rented the home with the Crows Nest. The house was immaculate, very well laid out and had all of the basic essentials for a week on the beach. Although I never actually met anyone face to face (which I was nervous about) the whole reservation went off without a hitch. The keys were in the spot designated, and the rest was history. I can't wait to go back this summer and stay again, which I am already planning. Thank you Vacation Rental Pros for a great week away!!
